hero.subtitle: Full-stack developer: polished interfaces, inspired by cultures and connections worldwide.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Digital products with an international reach
about.intro1: My name is Damiano Francesco and I'm a full-stack developer with a passion for digital experiences and human connections. My path in tech intertwines with travel and cultural exploration: every place teaches me to look at problems from different angles, with an open and curious mindset.
about.intro2: I prefer an analytical approach with a touch of creativity to tackle challenges. Always striving to improve both myself and my projects.
about.intro3: When I'm not building full-stack applications, I'm exploring the world and creating new international connections.

formazione.item1Title: Degree in Computer Science for Digital Businesses
formazione.item2Subtitle: Full-stack application for managing private clinics

esperienza.item2Content: Development of full-stack web applications, polished interfaces and tailored solutions for the AI sector, following agile methodology and top-down development.

about.timelineHint: Click on the dots for details

timelineItems.label: Diploma
timelineItems.detail: Technical education diploma, chemistry and biology track.

timelineItems.label: Odd jobs
timelineItems.detail: Odd jobs as kitchen helper and in a shoe factory.

timelineItems.label: Odd jobs · Blockchain
timelineItems.detail: Continued experience as kitchen helper and in shoe factory. Deep dive into Blockchain technology.

timelineItems.label: Official path · first steps in SEO and CS
timelineItems.detail: Start of official path: SEO certifications and community manager role for Discord servers. Deep dive into smart contracts and computer science.

timelineItems.label: Serious start · Uni Pegaso and Bit Spa Full Stack course
timelineItems.detail: The year I seriously started in tech: enrolment at Pegaso University (Computer Science for Digital Businesses) and Full Stack course at Bit Spa, focusing on Spring Boot, Kubernetes, Docker, Angular.

timelineItems.label: Opentusk Hackathon (Dec 2024)
timelineItems.detail: Worked with a team to build an MVP in 10 hours, dealing with tight deadlines. Built a Telegram bot for instant event registration. Tech: Telegram Bot API (RESTful), Python, BotFather.

timelineItems.label: Erasmus Brașov (Feb–Jun) · Full-Stack Developer LML
timelineItems.detail: Five months in Brașov, in the Carpathians: the Erasmus that changed my life. Courses in Software Engineering and Programming (C++, Java, .NET, C#), and above all people, travel and a drive to grow I had never felt before. Soft and hard skills I still carry. From September: Full-Stack Developer at LML technologies.

timelineItems.label: Ongoing
timelineItems.detail: Completing university and eager to grow internationally.

about.highlightsSubtitle: The values I bring to my daily work.

highlights.title: Clean code
highlights.description: Scalable and maintainable solutions, built for long-term impact.

highlights.title: Security
highlights.description: Data and information protection are my main focus.

highlights.title: Speed and safe delivery
highlights.description: Fast development with AI agents and secure releases in short timeframes, without compromising quality and data protection.

projects.sectionSubtitle: A selection of projects built with intention, inspired by diverse perspectives
projects.footerNote: More projects on <0>GitHub</0>. Looking for new collaborations for meaningful digital experiences.

featured.title: Patient management platform
featured.subtitle: Full-stack web application for managing patients, doctors and medical visits.
featured.description: Application developed as part of my degree thesis for managing a private clinic, with a modern, intuitive, responsive UI and efficient management of patients, doctors and visits.
featured.challenge: The challenge was to build an application that is easy to use for non-technical patients and doctors, all within a few days without compromising quality. Due to time constraints, I could not integrate a JWT-based security and role management system, but an header-based authentication system.
approach: Efficient management of patients and visits

additional.title: Booking management app
additional.description: Mobile app for managing bookings for an artesian well, exploring mobile development with Kotlin and Android Studio

additional.title: Student management app - Erasmus
additional.description: Desktop application for managing students during my Erasmus experience. In this project I explored different SQL databases and programming languages.

blog.title: Reflections
blog.subtitle: What I've learned between code and travel, coffee and quiet moments
blog.footerNote: These reflections are the result of a long journey of personal and professional growth. They are not tutorials or guides, just thoughts on what I've learned along the way and am still learning every day. They are here to inspire and grow with you.

empty.title: No reflections yet
empty.description: Check back soon for new stories and insights.
